div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2076 Sicily, 1890 (974) Burial: 455-50 B.C. (Seltmann); 465-60 (K) Contents: c. 200 AR Acragas Gela Himera: c. 12 didr. (rev. crab) 8 tetradr. (as Gutmann-Schwa- bacher 4 [1]; 7 [6]; 12 [1]) 2 didr. (as G.-S. 1) Leontini: tetradr.; didr. Messana Segesta: didr. Harvard Art Museums 1972.171 Syracuse: tetradr. (to Boehringer Grp. XII) didr. Disposition: E. J. Seltmann; Berlin Seltmann, ZfN 1895, pp. 165-82, illus. Gabrici, RIN 1894, pp. 415-7; 1895, p. 30 Gutmann-Schwabacher, MitBayNumGes 1929, pp.101 ff. Kraay, Greek Coins and History (London, 1969), pp. 32-4
